start: ^Hi there, could I just get a
^Of course! We have a really yummy light roast on brew right now, is that good?

c-1: ^Sure thing, I trust you! I don't know too much about
g-0: ^I haven't seen this place before, how long has this cafe been open?
^Only a few weeks! I'm the owner!

c-2: ^Wow, that's amazing! You must be a great businesswoman doing this on your own!
c-3: ^That's cool. I don't explore the city too much, but this place is really neat.

g-1: ^What's your name? I'm Eric, by the way.
^It's Georgie, nice to meet you! Do you work in the area?

c-4: ^Yeah I do! I work over in the super tall building right across from the shop.

g-2: ^Working at a place like this seems so nice. You get to talk to new people all the time.
^I really do love it. It's helping me to get to know new friends, since I just moved to the city to open the shop.
^It's nice, but it can be draining.

c-6: ^That's perfect then! It can be hard to get to know people in a place this big.

g-3: ^The black coffee I usually get tastes like burning...but at least it has caffeine. I'll let you do your thing now.
^I try to source the best beans I can so I'm sure you'll like it.
